content.raw:
So far, we've been using the same joint axis for all symmetrically located joints (e.g. left and right elbow flex joints have the same joint axis), so joints with axis not in y-direction have opposing movements (all the `*_**x` and `*_**z` joints) when given the same joint position.

If we are flipping this, should we also adjust `leg_mhx`, `leg_uhz`, `leg_lax`, `arm_elx`, `arm_ely`, `arm_shx`, `arm_uwy`, `arm_uwx` as well?
